channel.title: Pend Oreille County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pend Oreille County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-2 East - Newport
item.description: US-2 East in Newport. Merge right to continue east on US-2 towards Sandpoint (Idaho).

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-211 North
item.description: US-2 East approaching WA-211 North to Cusick and Metaline Falls.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20
item.description: US-2 east at WA-20 junction. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-20
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20/US-2 West
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west and US-2 west to Colville and Spokane. US-2 east here is a one-way street.

item.title: End WA-20 East at US-2
item.description: End WA-20 east at US-2. Use US-2 east for Sandpoint; use US-2 west for Spokane.

item.title: Kingsport, BC Customs Station
item.description: Customs Canada at End of US-95 North

item.title: US-Canada Border - Eastport, ID/Kingsgate, BC
item.description: The international bounday between United States and Canada at the Easport,ID/Kingsgate, BC border crossing. The picture is taken right on the international boundary. You can see a swath of trees cut down at the border itself, and you can see that same swath as a notch at the top of the ridge in the background. United States is to the left - Canada to the right.
